scripts.build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && node esmbuild/esmbuild build ./src dist
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && git push --tags && git push
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && git push --tags && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && git push --tags && git push
scripts.release: npm run build; mkdir -p release; cp -Rf dist release/$npm_package_name@$npm_package_version
